reasoning_log: The matching process relied heavily on identifying unique room types (kitchen, bathrooms, balcony) first, and then differentiating between the various empty rooms based on floor material, size, and window configuration. Desc_1 (Entrance/Foyer) was uniquely identified by the presence of the staircase (Image_1) and the highly reflective tile floor. Desc_4 (Living Room) was assigned to Image_4, which is a large open space with the same reflective tile, but without the staircase, fitting the main living area. The remaining rooms (Desc_6, Desc_7, Desc_9, Desc_11) were distinguished by their wood-look flooring and window layouts: Image_9 and Image_7 were clearly defined as a bedroom with balcony access and a standard secondary bedroom, respectively. Image_6 was assigned to the spacious multi-purpose room (Desc_6) due to its size and lighter floor tone, leaving Image_11 for the remaining bedroom/study (Desc_11), which features multiple windows and a door.

matching_result_list.evidence: Identified as the entrance/foyer area (玄關) due to the presence of the staircase and the highly reflective white tile floor, matching '高樓底' and '地面易清潔'.
A narrow bathroom lacking a glass shower enclosure, confirming '乾溼不分離' and '空間狹長'.
Clear image of a modern, complete kitchen with ample white cabinetry, built-in appliances, and counter space, matching '完整廚房' and '收納充足'.
Large, open room with highly reflective tile floor and a massive sliding glass door, fitting the description of a spacious living room ('客廳') with '大面採光'.
The only bathroom image featuring a freestanding bathtub and a glass shower enclosure, matching '有浴缸' and '乾溼分離'.
A very large, open room with light wood-look flooring and multiple windows/doors, suggesting a flexible, spacious '多功能房/起居室'.
The smallest of the empty rooms with wood-look flooring, featuring a single medium window and a rectangular layout, suitable for a '次臥房'.
Bathroom with clear glass shower separation and a vanity providing '收納充足', confirming '乾溼分離'.
Empty room with wood-look floor and a large sliding glass door leading directly to a railing/balcony view, matching '臥室帶陽台' and '大面採光'.
Dedicated semi-outdoor space with tiled walls and floor, clearly identifiable as a '陽台/工作陽台'.
Spacious room with wood-look floor, featuring multiple windows and a door, fitting the description of a flexible '臥室或書房' that can access an outdoor area ('可直接使用陽台').
